resources.string:
This application fetches details about particular CVE (Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures) from NIST National Vulnerability Database (nvd.nist.gov) using REST API services and stores the retrieved info into Room database. Results can then be reviewed locally using Recycler View.
 
NIST NVD Web Services: https://nvd.nist.gov/developers/vulnerabilities
 
Application currently supports CVEs with "cvssMetricV31" metric.
 
Data object consists of the following fields:
 
- cveid (ex. CVE-2022-38392) 
- baseScore (ex. 5.3) 
- baseSeverity (ex. MEDIUM) 
- vectorString (ex. CVSS:3.1/AV:P/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:C/C:N/I:N/A:H) 
- published (ex. 2024-02-01T15:31:27.863) 
- description (text describing the vulnerability)
 
 App Version: 0.99
 
 Contact Details: d_codl@utb.cz
